column4: Emily; can you pist a image bin of the hard drive with a screen shot of the gparted partitioner on the Ubuntu live cd?
Emily; the usb ports on one side of the eeepc don't boot forget which side.
only one usb works? is that what you mean?
one side or the other I think the left side doesn't
so that could explain it if it's the other side..
if you get booted give us a screen shot of gparted, my concern here is how many partitions you already have.
sorry to be stupid, what's gparted nit-wit ?
gparted is the partitioner on the live cd menu-system-admin-gparted. It will show us exactly whats on there now.
cd is a general term for the ISO that was loaded to the thumb, it can be burned to a cd.;)
good questions, better to know to understand the lingo.;)
yep, I just feel a bit stupid..
nah new things seem strange, and by and large the geek culture has a bit a a attitude.;)
